heading: Survivor Stories
sub_heading: Andrea... A hero, a fighter.. Know her journey..
description: CancerFax helps patients find cutting-edge treatments and ongoing clinical trials across top medical centers. From report review to travel support, we guide you every step of the way.

heading: About CancerFax
sub_heading: Global Reach. Personal Care. Proven Results.
content:
At CancerFax, we’re transforming the way patients discover and receive life-saving therapies, simplifying global care with science, technology, and trust. 
Know more about Cancerfax
